O.k. and Optimus was quickly arrested after discovering the orocal and 
everyone thought that was that, but a few of his followers survived? 
He never fought a second war or rescued any sparks, and barely had 
time to find out about organic core and its superiority to water?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> OOC: Sorry Dewboy. I know you want this plot to work, but It just 
> can't. It's just like saying Mustex knows about Veratis when they 
have 
> not actually met in the RPG. The basic story of a rebelling faction 
> sending a member to Earth was good, but you can not say 
> Techno-organics were on cybertron because it is not the Cybertron 
that 
> has been going on. Beast Machines never happened. This means that 
the 
> Maximals safely arrived on Cybertron, took Megatron to a trial or 
> something, and, in some way, he went back to Earth. That's it. BM 
> never happened because if it did, Megatron never could have had went 
> back to Earth, he would have been a part of Cybertron. It's hard, 
but 
> you'll have to deal with it.
